report.title: Auto-checked verification data
report.description: List of occurrences for verification with support for mapping the occurrences and the verification check system.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.record_status not in ('I','R','T') AND ('#searchArea#'='' OR st_intersects(o.public_geom, st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913))) #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for
param.join: JOIN locations lfilter ON st_intersects(lfilter.boundary_geom, o.public_geom) AND lfilter.id=#location_id#

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for
param.join: JOIN taxon_groups tgfilter ON tgfilter.id=o.taxon_group_id AND tgfilter.id IN (#taxon_groups#)

column.name: taxon
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.preferred_taxon=o.default_common_name then o.preferred_taxon ELSE o.preferred_taxon || ' | ' || o.default_common_name END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE o.created_by_id WHEN #currentUser# THEN true ELSE false END
